title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Computer Science Foundation Projects for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can prototype social problem-solving ideas using block-based coding tools.
Learners can develop a digital solution proposal (problem definition—functional design—test plan) through 3-person team collaboration.
Learners can present project improvement plans incorporating peer feedback from offline workshops.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
